attributes.action: To abandon the Plans to privatise the Post Office, keep it in Public Ownership and Fund it properly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of the United Kingdom deserve a decent postal service, one that is backed by the Crown, and serves the public, not the shareholders of a private company. We also deserve postal services available on every high street in the country, and the benefits that the Post Office can provide.
